mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_INFO( pet_num, cl_num, pet_name, pet_kind, pet_birth, pet_gen, pet_neut, pet_exper, pet_vaccin, pet_bite, kneecap, dislike, pet_others, pet_img )VALUES( SEQ_CTA_CHARGE.NEXTVAL, #{cl_num}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_kind}, #{pet_birth}, #{pet_gen}, #{pet_neut}, #{pet_exper}, #{pet_vaccin}, #{pet_bite}, #{kneecap}, #{dislike}, #{pet_others}, #{pet_img} )
